page.title: 19SUMMARY,SOUTH BOLNEY BLOCK
page.content: Most of the village of Bolney lies in the Northern block, so we have not surveyed the social life of the villagers, which will be done by others. We have concentrated on the rural inhabitants, some of whom live fairly isolated from other dwellings. All have at least one car per dwelling, which is just as well, since public transport is infrequent. Some are still on cess-pit drainage although although we found one Tudor house where a pump is still the only water source.We found no households without telephone or television;over half had videos but very few had computors.Most have conveniences like washing machines etc. Perhaps we are behind the times here, but we found that people love living & working here & do not want changees.
